getSupportedSampleRates().Description: Returns the array of supported sample rates if the codec supports only discrete values. Otherwise, it returns null. The array is sorted in ascending order.

isSampleRateSupported(int).Description: Query whether the sample rate is supported by the codec.

getSupportedSampleRateRanges().Description: Returns the array of supported sample rate ranges. The array is sorted in ascending order, and the ranges are distinct.

getMaxInputChannelCount().Description: Returns the maximum number of input channels supported. The codec supports any number of channels between 1 and this maximum value.

getBitrateRange().Description: Returns the range of supported bitrates in bits/second.

ClassDesc: A class that supports querying the audio capabilities of a codec.
